name: Daily Routine of Coffee and Thoughts
name_original: Daily Routine of Coffee and Thoughts
description:
Project for ARTD410 Game Art--visual discussion of what it is like for me living with a sensory processing disorder. Try to get more of the happy monsters and less of the mean monsters!

If you skip through the cutscene the game will probably break. 

The sound repeats when you replay so I'd recommend refreshing instead,
